Thank you, Ironbark. We are ready for you to open the door.
I'm the new king?  What are you talking about?
It's good to be the king!  Now, let's get back to what you were talking about before...
Show me what hooch you've got to sell, Kreeg.
A very sad tale. Thank you, spirit.
We live in a world of endless tragedy.
I'm going to have to kill something, aren't I?
I know very little of the Highborne and nothing of the Shen'dralar.
So, now that I'm the king... what have you got for me?!
Well then... show me the tribute!
This sounds like a task worthy of the new king!
Teleport me to the Molten Core, Lothos.
Silas, why is most everything at the fair free?  How do you make a profit?
I slay the man on the spot as my liege would expect me to do, as he is nothing more than a thief and a liar.
I turn over the man to my liege for punishment, as he has broken the law of the land and it is my sworn duty to enforce it.
I confiscate the corn he has stolen, warn him that stealing is a path towards doom and destruction, but I let him go to return to his family.
I allow the man to take enough corn to feed his family for a couple of days, encouraging him to leave the land.
I am ready to discover where my fortune lies!
I execute him as per my liege's instructions, and do it in such a manner that he suffers painfully before he dies as retribution for his crimes against my people.
I execute him as per my liege's instructions, but doing so in as painless of a way as possible.  Justice must be served, but I can show some compassion.
I risk my own life and free him so that he may prove his innocence.  If I can, I'll help him in any way.
Tell me more about these Darkmoon Cards.
Tell me about the Beasts Deck.
Tell me about the Portals Deck.
Tell me about the Elementals Deck.
Tell me about the Warlords Deck.
Tell me about the Furies Deck.
Tell me about the Lunacy Deck.
Tell me about the Blessings Deck.
Tell me about the Storms Deck.
I confront the ruler on his malicious behavior, upholding my liege's honor at the risk of any future diplomacy.
I not-so-quietly ignore the insult, hoping to instill a fear in the ruler that he may have gaffed.  I then inform my liege of the insult when I return.
I quietly ignore the insult.  I will not tell my liege, as I am to secure peace at all costs.  It's only an insult - not a declaration of war.

I would speak against my brother joining the order, rushing a permanent breech in our relationship.  He would be a danger to himself and those around him, and that is too great a risk hoping he would improve over time.
I would speak for my brother joining the order, potentially risking the safety of the order.  I could help him with the order's regimens, and I'd have faith in his ability to adapt and learn.
I would create some surreptitious means to keep my brother out of the order.  I can keep him out without him being any bit wiser, thereby saving our familial bonds.
I would show my liege the beast's ear and claim the beast's death as my own, taking the reward for my own use.  It is wrong to claim a deed as your own that someone else in fact did.
I would show my liege the beast's ear and claim the beast's death as my own - after all, I did slay it.  I would then offer some of the reward to the destitute knight to help his family.
I would remain silent about the kill and allow the knight to claim the reward to aid his family.
I'd love to get one of those written fortunes you mentioned!  I've got the space in my inventory for it.
What do you have for sale?

Admiral, I need another tree disguise kit.
We have much in common, night elf. I can't help but feel that perhaps it was fate that brought us together. Let me help you, Cowlen. Let my people help. We will right the wrongs. This I vow.

I fear that my people are somewhat responsible for this destruction. We are refugees, displaced from our homes by the Burning Legion. This tragedy is a result of our latest evacuation. Our vessel crashed - this debris is a part of that vessel.
I have not come to kill you, night elf. And the gods did not do this...
It's over, Spark. The admiral knows it was you who betrayed the Alliance. Now you're either going to cooperate with me and tell me everything that you know or we're going to engage in some fisticuff.

I'll have you out of there in just a moment.

Can you spare a drake to take me to Lord Afrasastrasz in the middle of the temple?
Yes, please, I would like to return to the ground level of the temple.
I would like to go to Lord Afrasastrasz in the middle of the temple.
I'd like passage to the Transitus Shield.
May I use a drake to fly elsewhere?
I would like to buy from you.
I would like to browse your goods, Illusia.
One of the cultists seems to have stumbled onto my blade and died... can I have a new disguise? I promise that I will be more careful this time.
My lord, I need to get to the top of the temple.
Can I get a ride back to ground level, Lord Afrasastrasz?
We need to get into the fight. Are you ready?
I want to exchange my Ruby Essence for Emerald Essence.

So how does the Infinite Dragonflight plan to interfere?
Teleport me to Amber Ledge, please.
Brann, it would be our honor!
Do you think I could take a ride on one of those flying machines?
I wish to unlearn my talents.
I wish to unlearn my talents.

So where do we go from here?
You can trust me.  I am no friend of the Lich King's.
Salanar, I must return to the Realm of Shadows.
I would like to whisper my secret code to you to receive Tyrael's Hilt.
I am ready, Highlord. Let the siege of Light's Hope begin!

I challenge you to a duel, Scarlet scum!
I've heard that vrykul women cannot fight at all. If you wish to prove me wrong, you can try.
May I browse your epic gem recipes?
Sorry, Tinky, but I can't afford you as a distraction while I'm doing what needs to be done here.
I have bad news for you Onu'zun: I'm gonna have to cut short your dreams!
Activate the crystals when we get in trouble, right.
Get your people to safety, we'll keep the Blue Dragonflight's forces at bay.
Grasp the Eye of the Lich King and focus your will upon it to scry for important information.
Waken the slumbering mjordin to see if it is really the ancient hero, Iskalder.

What are the anomalies you speak of?
What is a "resilient foundation of construction"?
So... the Earthen were made out of stone?
Anything else I should know about the Earthen?
I think I understand the Creators' design intent for the Earthen now.  What are the Earthen's anomalies that you spoke of earlier?
What high-stress environments would cause the Earthen to destabilize?
What happens when the Earthen destabilize?
Troggs?!  Are the troggs you mention the same as the ones in the world today?
You mentioned two results when the Earthen destabilize.  What is the second?
Dwarves!!!  Now you're telling me that dwarves originally came from the Earthen?!
These dwarves are the same ones today, yes?  Do dwarves maintain any other links to the Earthen?
This is a lot to think about.
I will access the discs now.
Tell me more about Forging Armor.
Tell me more about Forging Weapons.

That's it!  I'm tired of helping you out.  It's time we settled things on the battlefield!

Grant me your mark, mighty ancient.
Grant me your mark, mighty ancient.
Hemet Nesingwary, what are you doing here in the Outland?
Greetings, elder. It is time for your people to end their hostility toward the draenei and their allies.
I did not mean to deceive you, elder. The draenei of Telredor thought to approach you in a way that would be familiar to you.
I will tell them. Farewell, elder.
I wish to browse your wares.
Let me browse your reagents and poison supplies.
Specialist, eh? Just what kind of specialist are you, anyway?
I would like to buy from you.
I wish to buy from you.
I would like to buy from you.
This means war, Lump! War I say!
And you think you can just eat anything you want? You're obviously trying to eat the Broken of Telaar.
Why are Boulderfist out this far? You know that this is Kurenai territory.
I have killed many of your ogres, Lantresor. I have no fear.
What do I need to do?
We will fight you until the end, then, Lantresor. We will not stand idly by as you pillage our towns and kill our people.
My people ask that you pull back your Boulderfist ogres and cease all attacks on our territories. In return, we will also pull back our forces.
My apologies. I did not mean to offend. I am here on behalf of my people.
I have heard of your kind, but I never thought to see the day when I would meet a half-breed.
Should I know? You look like an orc to me.
Empoor, you're going to tell me what I want to know, or else!
How do you see them now?
I see twisted steel and smell sundered earth.
Altruis sent me. He said that you could help me.
I have been sent by Sal'salabim to collect a debt that you owe. Pay up or I'm going to have to hurt you.
I have been sent by Sal'salabim to collect a debt that you owe. Pay up or I'm going to have to hurt you.
He wants his "golds." Pay up or die... again...
I have been sent by Sal'salabim to collect a debt that you owe. Pay up or I'm going to have to hurt you.

I want to browse your goods.
What do you have for sale?
I'm on a bombing mission for Forward Commander Kingston.  I need a gryphon destroyer!
I wish to browse your wares.
Ezekiel said that you might have a certain book...
I need some reagents and poisons, lady.
Dealer Hazzin, what do you have to offer?
What do you have to sell, Tuluman?
What do you have for sale?
Show me where I can fly.
Send me to the Abyssal Shelf!
Send me to the Abyssal Shelf!
I would like to go to the battleground.
Walk free, elder.  Bring the spirits back to your tribe.
Walk free, elder.  Bring the spirits back to your tribe.
Walk free, elder.  Bring the spirits back to your tribe.
I want to browse your goods.
I want to browse your goods.
Tell me more about this thing you call "cooking?"
I am ready, Anchorite.  Let us begin the exorcism.
I won't challenge you, but I'd like to see your wares.
I seek training to ride a steed.
Me want Gug fix armor. Maybe me buy someting.
What do you have for sale?
What do you have for sale, Rumpus?
Kronk, tell me about the charged crystal foci.
How dare you question an overseer of the Dragonmaw!
Who speaks of me? What are you talking about, broken?
I am here for you, overseer.
I am an envoy of Balthas. He has sent me to collect a flawless arcane essence.
Your propaganda won't work on me. Spout your treasonous filth elsewhere, traitor!
I wish to browse your wares, Hazel.
Finlay, let me see what you have for sale.
Show me what you have for sale.
You look like an intelligent person. Why don't you read one of these leaflets and give it some thought?
Sir, I need another flying machine...
Official Explorers' League business, McGoyver. Take me to the Explorers' League Outpost!
Official Explorers' League business, McGoyver. Take me to the Explorers' League Outpost!
Walt sent me to pick up some dark iron ingots.
<Feed the grub to the rock falcon.>
Taruk sent me to collect what you owe.
Do you sell any of this stuff?
Do you sell any of this stuff?
<Discreetly search the pirate's pockets for Taruk's payment.>
Here's a gold, buy yourself something nice.
rows.box_text: Do you really want to bribe Olga?

rows.option_text: I'd like to buy Jack a drink.  Perhaps something... extra strong.
<Get on the work bench and let Walt put you in the golem suit.>
<Get on the work bench and let Walt put you in the golem suit.>
<Get on the work bench and let Walt put you in the golem suit.>
<Get on the work bench and let Walt put you in the golem suit.>
I don't have time for chit-chat, Lou. Take me to Scalawag Point.
I want to browse your goods.
I want to browse your goods.
Crafty, I need another Warsong banner.
Tell me what's going on out here, Fizzcrank.
Tell me your story again, Fizzcrank.
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
Wait, back up. What was that last thing you said?
What do you know about the Cult of the Damned?
I have reason to believe you're involved in cultist activity.
How long have you worked for the Cult of the Damned?
I am prepared to face Saragosa!
Keristrasa, I am finished here. Please return me to the Transitus Shield.
I wish to buy from you.
Come on, Budd. Time to play with the ice trolls!
Ummm... the frog says you're a traitor, "matey."
Clear me for the teleporter, I'm ready to go!
I need some more of your fine grog, Mack.
I seem to have misplaced your Shredder Control Device... might you have another?
I want to browse your goods.
Show me what you have for sale, trapper.
What can you tell me about Loken and the iron dwarves?
We have the purified ashes of Vordrassil's sapling.  If we can subdue Ursoc, we might be able to heal his soul.
Assume your druidic bear form, Tur.
You're free to go Orsonn, but first tell me what's wrong with the furbolg.
Thank you, Son of Ursoc.  I'll see what can be done.
Thank you, Kodian.  I'll do what I can.
I am ready to be teleported to Dalaran.
I would like to enter the secret code to receive my Competitor's Souvenir.
Sorry to have bothered you, friend. Carry on!
Orik, I need another murkweed elixir.
I'm sure Arthas will be back any day now, soldier. Keep your chin up!
I must be going now, soldier. Stay vigilant!
I'm sure everything will work out, footman.
Where would you like to fly to?
Greer, I need a gryphon to ride and some bombs to drop on New Agamand!
I need to get to Wintergarde Keep fast!
Why would I want to ride a shredder?
Where can I get a Refurbished Shredder Key?
I'd like to use the stables.
What is the ultimate ability of the Amber Drake?
Wyrmbait, eh? Welp, go fetch us Icestorm!
What do you think they're up to?
Admiral Keller sent me, Emilune. Please send me to Westguard Keep!
Harry said I could take his bomber to Bael'gun's. I'm ready to go!
Soldier, you have new orders. You're to pull back and report to the sergeant!
Let's move Brann, enough of the history lesson!
You look safe enough... let's do this.
<Reach down and pull the Injured Rainspeaker Oracle to its feet.>
Shaman Vekjik, I have spoken with the big-tongues and they desire peace. I have brought this offering on their behalf.
We're only doing what is best for Lordaeron, your Highness.
Kara, I need to be flown out to the Dens of Dying to find Bixie.
I am ready to travel to your village now.
You're free to go now. The way out is safe.
Great and powerful Har'koa, please call for one of your children that it might stealthily carry me into the Altar of Quetz'lun.
I'm ready to battle the dreadlord, sire.
I'm ready to start the distillation, uh, Tipsy.
Stefan told me you would demonstrate the purpose of this item.
What are you hiding under that fold of flesh?
Have a spare bunch of bananas?
I could really use a papaya.
Uhh, can you send me on the tour of Zul'Drak?
I need to find Lafoo, do you have his bug bag?
I need to find Jaloot, do you have his favorite crystal?
I need to find Jaloot, do you have his favorite crystal?
I need to find Moodle, do you have his stress ball?
I am ready to be teleported to Dalaran.
Show me where I can fly.
I would like to buy from you.
Lord-Commander, I would hear your tale.
<You nod slightly but do not complete the motion as the lord-commander narrows his eyes before he continues.>
I thought that they now called themselves the Scarlet Onslaught?
Lord-Commander, would you repeat what you said before?
Where did the grand admiral go?
Lord-Commander, would you repeat what you said before?
That's fine. When do I start?
Lord-Commander, would you repeat what you said before?
Lord-Commander, would you repeat what you said before?
Lord-Commander, would you repeat what you said before?
I'd like to stable my pet here.
I would like to go to the battleground.
I would like to go to the battleground.
I would like to go to the battleground.
Gymer, where are Algar, Navarius and Thrym?
Gymer, what do I need to know? I've never ridden on a giant.
I'm ready - lets get you out of here.
Skip the warmup, sister... or are you too scared to face someone your own size?
I am ready to be shown the fate of Krolmir,
If it please you, King Jokkum, may I know what has become of Krolmir?
You want me to take part in the Hyldsmeet to end the war?
Very well.  I'll take part in this competition.
I am ready to head further into Storm Peaks.
Can you tell me what became of Sif?
He did more than that, Thorim.  He controls Ulduar now.
I am interested in mage training.
We're with you Brann! Open it!
Lady Proudmoore, I am ready to go to Orgrimmar. Please open a portal.
Reporting for duty, your majesty! Let the assault begin!
<Get in the bomber and return to Scalawag Point.>
Place Avruu's Orb on the altar.
I am ready to return to the realm of the living.
Lift the frost leopard's tail to check if it's a male or a female.
Lift the icepaw bear's tail to check if it's a male or a female.
Show me where I can fly.
What could be worse than death?
You can count on me, Hero.
What are the stones of binding?
Touch the Suntara stone and call forth Lathoric the Black and his guardian, Obsidion.
Can you help me get down?
I am interested in warlock training.
That is tragic. How did this happen?
I want to examine this pylon.
I want to examine this pylon.
I want to examine this pylon.
Tell me more about the Eastern Crystal Pylon.
Tell me more about the Northern Crystal Pylon.
Tell me more about the Western Crystal Pylon.
I am interested in warlock training.
I wish to unlearn my talents.
I am interested in warlock training.
Um... sorry to bother you, but could I see Goodsteel's ledger again... if you're not using it.
I would like to check my deposit box.
I want to browse your goods.
The mage tower to the north.
I want to browse your goods.
I am interested in warlock training.
I wish to unlearn my talents.
I am interested in mage training.
I wish to unlearn my talents.
Where can I get Enchanted Thorium?
Where can I find Crystal Restore?
I want to browse your goods.
I am in search of a great and powerful Warlock.
I would like to buy from you.
I wish to browse your wares.
I wish to unlearn Shadoweave Tailoring.
Show me where I can fly.
Lady Jaina told me to speak to you about using a gryphon to survey Alcaz Island.
I want to browse your goods.
I want to browse your goods.
No restraints? Just in a circle?
Until what, Eva? I must know.
The pleasure is mine, madam. Might I ask what it is that you are doing here?
Who do I need to kill?
This is disheartening. Is there anything I can do to stop this?
Tell me about the Cult of the Damned.
I need another Argent Dawn Commission.
Why should I bother fixing the trap?  Why not just eliminate the guard the old fashioned way?
Mark my words, I will catch you, imp. And when I do!
I wish to browse your wares, Calandrath.
Show me what you have for sale, "Slim."
I'm ready to fly to Sholazar Basin.
Let me browse your selection of fireworks.
I want to browse your goods.
I want to browse your goods.
I wish to make use of the stables.
Teach me the ways of the spirits.
Tell me of your past, Farseer.
I wish to unlearn my talents.
Teach me the ways of the spirits.
I wish to unlearn my talents.
Yes, please, if you do not mind.
What did it say to you?
Lady Jaina, this may sound like an odd request... but I have a young ward who is quite shy. You are a hero to him, and he asked me to get your autograph.
Well what do you know, this is Children's Week! What can I do to help?
I want to exchange my Emerald Essence for Amber Essence.
Chromie, you and I both know what's going to happen in this time stream. We've seen this all before. Can you just skip us ahead to all the real action?
I want to browse your goods.
Ormus, what happened to your eyes?
I'd like to stable my pet here.
I wish to join the battle!
I want to browse your goods.
I would like to go to the battleground.
I wish to join the battle!
I wish to join the battle!

We are ready to get you out of here, Thrall. Let's go!
I need a pack of incendiary bombs.
The situation is rather complicated, Thrall. It would be best for you to head into the mountains now, before more of Blackmoore's men show up. We'll make sure Taretha is safe.
I'm ready to go to Durnholde Keep.
What do you have to eat, Celeste?
I want to exchange my Amber Essence for Emerald Essence.
I need another of your elixirs, Drakuru.
I have a few more questions, Gymer.
I have a few more questions, Gymer.
I need to find Goregek, do you have his shackles?
I need to find Dajik, do you have his worn chalk?
I need to find Zepik, do you have his hunting horn?

I have battled many beasts, dragon. I will help you.
But you are dragons! How could orcs do this to you?
What do you have for sale, Oronok?
I am ready to hear your story, Oronok.
How do I find the cipher?
How do you know all of this?
Yet what? What is it, Oronok?
Send me to the Abyssal Shelf!
I'm on a bombing mission for Forward Commander To'arch. I need a wyvern destroyer!
Send me to the Abyssal Shelf!
Tell me about the demon hunter training grounds at the Ruins of Karabor.
There was something else I wanted to ask you, Altruis.
I have killed many of your ogres, Lantresor. I have no fear.
Take me to the Caverns of Time.
I'm as ready as I'll ever be.
Can you spread the reflective dust again?
Yes elder. Tell me more of the book.
I am an ally of the Cenarion Expedition, Mortog. Show me your wares.
I lost the Flute of the Ancients and require a replacement, Eridan.
I need another disguise, Borak. I lost the last one.
I bring word from Lord Illidan.
The cipher fragment is to be moved. Have it delivered to Zuluhed.
Perhaps you did not hear me, Ruusk. I am giving you an order from Illidan himself!

Very well. I will return to the Black Temple and notify Lord Illidan of your unwillingness to carry out his wishes. I suggest you make arrangements with your subordinates and let them know that you will be leaving this world soon.
Do I need to go into all the gory details? I think we are both well aware of what Lord Illidan does with those that would oppose his word. Now, I must be going! Farewell, Ruusk! Forever...
Ah, good of you to come around, Ruusk. Thank you and farewell.
I want to browse your goods.
So the Searing Blade is expendable?
Is there anything you would have of me?
<Take this book for the good of Azeroth!>
<Take this book for the good of Azeroth!>
<Take this book for the good of Azeroth!>
Search the corpse for Kagrosh's pack.
Overseer, I am here to negotiate on behalf of the Cenarion Expedition.
Yes, I'd love a ride to Blackwind Landing.
Absolutely!  Send me to the Skyguard Outpost.
So what of the cipher now? And your boys?
I will find your boys and the cipher, Oronok.
Lend me a Windrider. I'm going to Spinebreaker Post!
Sprinkle some of the reindeer dust onto Metzen.
A fine offer, Floyd. I wish to make Hellfire Peninsula my home.
I'm looking for some specialty goods. Let me browse your wares, Floyd.
Magistrix Carinda has sent me to ask you about Arelion's secret. Who was he seeing?
What is Ysera and how were you blessed?
So why are you still here?
How do I form a guild?
I want to create a guild crest.
Teach me how to create and apply a Heavy Runecloth Bandage, Doctor.
I'm ready to travel to Stormwind.
Give me a battle standard. I will take control of Twin Spire Ruins.
Give me a battle standard. I will take control of Twin Spire Ruins.
I'd like to fly to Rut'theran Village.
Do you know where I can find Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility?
I'd like to fly to Thunder Bluff.
Do you know where I can find Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance?
I have heard your words, Great Bear Spirit, and I understand. I now seek your blessings to fully learn the way of the Claw.
What's needed for the cauldron at the Writhing Haunt?
<Copy the schematic into your engineering notebook.>
You have fought well, spirit.  I ask you to grant me the strength of your body and the strength of your heart.
I want to browse your goods.
I wish to face the Defiler.
Yes, Augustus.  I would like to do business.
You're an alchemist?  So am I.  Perhaps you can teach me what you know...
What's needed for the cauldron at Gahrron's Withering?
I wish to purchase arcane quickener from you.
What's needed for the cauldron at Felstone Field?
What's needed for the cauldron at Dalson's Tears?
What's needed for the cauldron at the Writhing Haunt?
What's needed for the cauldron at Gahrron's Withering?
I am ready to hear your tale, Tirion.
Thank you, Tirion. What of your identity?
I know this is rather silly but a young ward who is a bit shy would like your hoofprint.
You will have to excuse me, Lorax, I do not speak 'crazy'.
Do you? Perhaps you should tell me what it is that is bothering you.
So how did he break the deal?

Perhaps I can be of some assistance. I will make a deal with you, Satyr. I shall recover this unforged breastplate and slay the beast. In exchange for this task, you will teach me how to create the breastplate.
My apologies, I did not realize that you could understand what I was saying. What is it you are doing out here?
Hrm, I'm listening. What is this offer?
I am ready for the illusion, Myranda.
I have pald your price, Gloom'rel. Now teach me your secrets!
What do you know of it?
So what did Ragnaros do next?
Hello, Frankal. I've heard that you might have some information as to the whereabouts of Mistress Natalia Mar'alith.
That's what I like to hear.
You couldn't handle a lone night elf priestess?
I've been meaning to ask out about that monkey.
What a story! So she went into Hive'Regal and that was the last you saw of her?
Hello, Rutgar. The Commander has sent me here to gather some information about his missing wife.
What happened to her after that?
Lost it? What do you mean?
I'll be back once I straighten this mess out.
Can you tell me about this shard?

I'm a prisoner, what does it look like? The draenei filth captured me as I exited the sun gate. They killed our portal controllers and destroyed the gate. The Sun King will be most displeased with this turn of events.

Ah yes, Sironas. I had nearly forgotten that Sironas was here. I served under Sironas back on Outland. I hadn't heard of this abomination, though; those damnable draenei captured me before I even fully materialized on this world.
Incredible. How did Sironas accomplish such a thing?
Sironas is an eredar... I mean, yes, obviously.
The Vector Coil is massive. I hope we have more than one abomination guarding the numerous weak points.
I did and you believed me. Thank you for the information, blood elf. You have helped us more than you could know.
Can you send me to Theramore? I have an urgent message to Lady Jaina from Highlord Bolvar.
I'm ready to fly! Take me up, dragon!
I'm interested in purchasing a new drake.
I want to browse your goods.
I want to browse your goods.
Grant me your mark, mighty ancient.
Grant me your mark, mighty ancient.
Grant me your mark, wise ancient.
Grant me your mark, wise ancient.
Grant me your mark, wise ancient.
Grant me your mark, wise ancient.
I heard that your dog Fei Fei took Klatu's prayer beads...
Is there anything I can do for you, Greatmother?
Left? How can you choose to leave?
What can be done? I have tried many different things. I have done my best to help the people of Nagrand. Each time I have approached Garrosh, he has dismissed me.
You raised all of the orcs here, Greatmother?
Hello, Greatmother. Garrosh told me that you wanted to speak with me.
Garrosh is beyond redemption, Greatmother. I fear that in helping the Mag'har, I have convinced Garrosh that he is unfit to lead.
I have done all that I could, Greatmother. I thank you for your kind words.
I will return to Azeroth at once, Greatmother.
It is my Warchief, Greatmother. The leader of my people. From my world. He... He is the son of Durotan. He is your grandchild.

Greatmother, I never had the honor. Durotan died long before my time, but his heroics are known to all on my world. The orcs of Azeroth reside in a place known as Durotar, named after your son. And... (You take a moment to breathe and think through what you are about to tell the Greatmother.)
Greatmother, you are the mother of Durotan?
A bit ungrateful, aren't we?  The way out is clear, flee quickly!
You're free to go now. The way out is safe.
Please teach me how to become a Master of Potions, Lauranna.
I wish to unlearn Potion Mastery.
rows.box_text: Do you really want to unlearn your alchemy specialty and lose all associated recipes?

rows.option_text: Please teach me how to become a Master of Elixirs, Lorokeem.
I wish to unlearn Elixir Mastery.
rows.box_text: Do you really want to unlearn your alchemy specialty and lose all associated recipes?

rows.option_text: Please teach me how to become a Master of Transmutations, Zarevhi.
I wish to unlearn Transmutation Mastery.
rows.box_text: Do you really want to unlearn your alchemy specialty and lose all associated recipes?

rows.option_text: I wish to purchase one of these creatures.
I would like to buy from you.
I would like to buy from you.
Will you blow up that door now?
Insert an Apexis Shard, and begin!
Mark my words, I will catch you, imp. And when I do!
